name: 10.14 "No Rest for the Woody" Online Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 10 | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the cold opening, who called the bar numerous times leaving messages on the answering machine?
questions.explanation:
Vera.

	The first two times she called wanting Norm to come home. The third time, she told Sam Norm was in bed beside her but she thought it was the dog.

questions.text: Why did Kelly have a bag on her hand?
questions.correct: To cover up the engagement ring Woody bought for her
options: She had bad nails and was ashamed
She broke her finger and didn't want anyone to know
When you're as rich as her, you can do things like that for no reason
questions.explanation:
To cover up the engagement ring Woody bought for her.

	Kelly didn't understand why she had to have a bag on her hand. When Rebecca asked about it, Kelly told her the reason. Woody said, "Way to be anti-climactic, Kelly."

questions.text: Why did Woody say he and Kelly had a prenuptial agreement?
questions.correct: If things didn't work out he didn't want to lose half his stuff.
options: Kelly didn't want to lose half her stuff if things didn't work out.
questions.explanation:
If things didn't work out he didn't want to lose half his stuff.

	Kelly was extremely rich. The most logical reason for why they had a prenuptial agreement was to protect her, not him.

questions.text: Where was Woody working the graveyard shift?
questions.explanation:
Graveyard.

	He worked at Cheers till 2:30am. When he was asked by Sam where he was doing the graveyard shift he said, "Graveyard...gee whiz, say goodnight, Gracie."

questions.text: Who locked Rebecca in the hole where the heat duct was?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla said someone might trip on the grate so she was putting it back up. When Rebecca said she'd call the police, Carla cut the phone wire as well.

questions.text: Why did Woody think that the man wanted to take his blood?
questions.explanation:
For being late.

	The man was from the insurance company and had to take blood samples of all the employees. Woody missed all that and since he was late when the guy said he was taking Woody's blood, Woody said, "Just for being late. This is the toughest job I've ever had."

questions.text: After days without sleep Woody started to hallucinate.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He thought he was covered in flies. He also couldn't recognize the women at the bar was Kelly.

questions.text: Who was afraid to have blood taken?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Frasier told Carla in a very vivid detail how the blood would be taken. When he did this Carla passed out and Frasier told the man, "She's all yours."

Celeste Holm.

	Celeste Holm was born in 1917 in Brooklyn, NY. IN 1965, and she played the Godmother in the TV-movie "Cinderella". She had a long career from 1946-2014. "College Debts" came out posthumously. In 2012, at the age of 95, she passed away as a result of a heart attack.

questions.text: Who did Woody think Kelly's grandmother was?
questions.correct: The woman he buried the night before
options: A dentist he owed money to
questions.explanation:
The woman he buried the night before.

	It turned out that it was all a joke. Kelly's grandmother gave Woody and Kelly her blessing.
